===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=はごいた|羽子|tr1=hago|t1=shuttlecock|lit1=feathered little thing|板|tr2=ita|t2=board|pos2=in reference to the paddles used to hit the shuttlecock}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref><ref name="SMK5">{{R:Shinmeikai5}}</ref>

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=k|はごいた|acc=2|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|はごいた}}

# a [[hagoita]]: a [[rectangular]] [[wooden]] [[paddle]] used to play [[hanetsuki]] (traditional Japanese [[battledore]], similar to [[badminton]]); often painted with a colorful image and used as an [[ornament]] in modern Japan: see {{m|ja|羽根突き|tr=hanetsuki}} for more
